text: Total Metal is the compilation album by heavy metal band Atomkraft. It contains songs from albums published by Neat Records. == Track listing == === CD 1 === # Total Metal # Pour the Metal In # Foliage # Teutonic Pain # Funeral Pyre # Rich Bitch # Starchild # Warzone # Vision of Belshazzar # Burn in Hell # Requiem # Protector # Dead Man's Hand # Medley: This Planet Burning / Death Valley === CD 2 === # Future Warriors # Queen of Death # The Cage # Demolition # Heat and Pain # Mode 3 # Your Mentor # Trial by Deception # Demolition Boyz # Visions of Belshhazzar (Live) # Foliage (Live) # Annihilate the Bride # Dance of the Immortals # Total Metal ('83 Demo) # Death Valley ('83 Demo) Category:Compilation albums
title: Total Metal
